1 #include <Eigen/Dense>
2 #include <gtest/gtest.h>
3 #include <ros/ros.h>
4 #include <geometry_msgs/WrenchStamped.h>
5 #include <geometry_msgs/PoseStamped.h>

7 #include <dynamic_reconfigure/Config.h>
8 #include <cartesian_impedance_controller/ControllerState.h>

10 const std::string ctrl_name = "/CartesianImpedance_trajectory_controller";
11 
12 //ROSFunctionalityTests tested the controller functionality
13 
14 TEST(ROSFunctionalityTests, forceTests) // Tested that a desired external force is being applied.
15 {
16  ros::NodeHandle n;
17  ros::Duration timeout(5);
18  ros::Publisher wrench_publisher = n.advertise<geometry_msgs::WrenchStamped>(ctrl_name +"/set_cartesian_wrench", 500);
19 
20  const std::string controller_state {ctrl_name + "/controller_state"};
21  auto msg_controller_up = ros::topic::waitForMessage<cartesian_impedance_controller::ControllerState>(controller_state, n, timeout);
22  ASSERT_TRUE(msg_controller_up != nullptr) << "Controller is not up.";
23  EXPECT_DOUBLE_EQ(std::abs(msg_controller_up->commanded_wrench.force.x), 0.0);
24 
25  geometry_msgs::WrenchStamped wrench_msg;
26  wrench_msg.header.frame_id = "world";
27  wrench_msg.header.stamp = ros::Time::now();
28  wrench_msg.wrench.force.x = 5.0;
29  wrench_msg.wrench.force.y = 0.0;
30  wrench_msg.wrench.force.z = 0.0;
31  wrench_msg.wrench.torque.x = 0.0;
32  wrench_msg.wrench.torque.y = 0.0;
33  wrench_msg.wrench.torque.z = 0.0;
34  wrench_publisher.publish(wrench_msg);
35  ros::Duration(1).sleep();
36 
37  for (int i = 0; i < 5; i++) {
38  auto msg_state = ros::topic::waitForMessage<cartesian_impedance_controller::ControllerState>(controller_state, n, timeout);
39 
40  ASSERT_TRUE(msg_state != nullptr) << "Did not receive message on iteration " << i + 1;
41  EXPECT_GE(std::abs(msg_state->commanded_wrench.force.x), 1.0);
42  }
43 
44  // Cancel the wrench
45  wrench_msg.header.stamp = ros::Time::now();
46  wrench_msg.wrench.force.x = 0.0;
47  wrench_publisher.publish(wrench_msg);
48  ros::Duration(1).sleep();
49 }
50 
51 TEST(ROSFunctionalityTests, motionTests) // Tested that a new desired reference pose is sought
52 {
53  ros::NodeHandle n;
54  ros::Duration timeout(5);
55  ros::Publisher pose_publisher = n.advertise<geometry_msgs::PoseStamped>(ctrl_name +"/reference_pose", 500);
56  ros::Duration(0.5).sleep(); // C++ publisher need some time to start up
57 
58  const std::string controller_state {ctrl_name + "/controller_state"};
59  auto msg_controller_up = ros::topic::waitForMessage<cartesian_impedance_controller::ControllerState>(controller_state, n, timeout);
60  ASSERT_TRUE(msg_controller_up != nullptr) << "Controller is not up.";
61  EXPECT_NEAR(std::abs(msg_controller_up->current_pose.position.y), 0.3, 0.05);
62 
63  geometry_msgs::PoseStamped pose_msg;
64  pose_msg.header.frame_id = "world";
65  pose_msg.header.stamp = ros::Time::now();
66  pose_msg.pose.position.x = 0.4;
67  pose_msg.pose.position.y = 0.0;
68  pose_msg.pose.position.z = 0.14;
69  pose_msg.pose.orientation.x = 0.0;
70  pose_msg.pose.orientation.y = 1.0;
71  pose_msg.pose.orientation.z = 0.0;
72  pose_msg.pose.orientation.w = 0.0;
73  pose_publisher.publish(pose_msg);
74  ros::Duration(5).sleep();
75 
76  for (int i = 0; i < 5; i++) {
77  auto msg_state = ros::topic::waitForMessage<cartesian_impedance_controller::ControllerState>(controller_state, n, timeout);
78  ASSERT_TRUE(msg_state != nullptr) << "Did not receive message on iteration " << i + 1;
79  EXPECT_NEAR(std::abs(msg_state->reference_pose.position.y), 0.0, 0.11);
80  EXPECT_NEAR(std::abs(msg_state->current_pose.position.y), 0.0, 0.15);
81  ros::Duration(0.1).sleep();
82  }
83 }
84 
85 int main(int argc, char **argv){
86  testing::InitGoogleTest(&argc, argv);
87  ros::init(argc, argv, "test_ros");
88  return RUN_ALL_TESTS();
89 }
